'''Ayesha's Chaos Prospector''' is a limited time [[Gadget]] obtained from the [[Shadow of the Ancients]] Event. It is used to find [[General Purpose Directional Conduction Component]]<!--anything else in next days?-->. It expired on 2021/11/15 04:00.

==Notes==
*The following messages will pop up while placing Ayesha's Chaos Prospector:
**''Direction of Suspected Target Site indicated'' (the light points in the direction to travel in).
**''Suspected Target Site discovered'' (a beam of light appears from the ground, which can be interacted with).
*If the Suspected Target Site spawns monsters, the following message will appear: ''Prospecting error, surrounding opponents alerted''.
*Only the host can use the gadget during [[Co-Op Mode]].
